greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of circular permutations of the multiset {1,1,2,2,...,n,n} (up to rotations) with even distances between equal elements.
formula: For odd n, a(n) = 0. For even n, a(n) = (n!^3 / (n/2)!^2 / 2^n + n!) / (2n).
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 09, 2008
